text: Evan David Taubenfeld (born 27 June 1983) is an American musician, singer- songwriter, producer, executive music director, and actor. He was Avril Lavigne's lead guitarist from spring 2002 to September 2004. == References == Category:American pop musicians Category:American producers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Living people Category:1983 births
title: Evan Taubenfeld
